commit message: update README and move to markdown
remove old code, simplify, and document LandingActivity
rename get* methods with network components to fetch*

make NowPlayingActivity less sensitive to orientation change

Long-polling is eliminated in this commit since this should not be done in an
AsyncTask, but something like a Service which has longer lifetime than the
activity itself.
write 'info' and 'sync' api calls as a service

stop the service if possible

not currently effective but may be down the road

reject updates to schedules when no longer set on that channel

This is to fix a bug where you are tuned in to one channel, you change, and the
long-poll from the previous channel updates your view with data from the wrong
channel.
calculate drift based on timestamp when request finishes
